metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7559 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: It was found that the Apache ActiveMQ client before 5.15.5 exposed a remote shutdown command in the ActiveMQConnection class. An attacker logged into a compromised broker could use this flaw to achieve denial of service on a connected client.

criterions.comment: activemq package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.14.3-3').
